name: Beat The Buddy Bear Game
description:
Are you a fan of adventure buddy games? The bear games which give your moral self, satisfaction and contentment? The despicable bear games give you an outlet to let your kid went out all the frustration with a few kicks and hits to the evil bear. Your kids require this buddy game to learn to manage their frustration and have a fun filled super beat buddy bear game play.

The buddy bear from the league of evil bear is known for its evil motives, it only craves power of the buddy world and it is preparing for the bear attack, which will reduce the buddy world to ashes! You have to stop the evil devil bear in the buddy adventure game from destroying the world!

The despicable devil bear is about to conquer your world by hypnotizing the civilians into helping the buddy, making each person his captive forever! You just have little time left until the buddy bear attack raises its flag of victory over the world, so be prepared and practice hit the buddy or kick the bear perfectly before the arrival of devil bear!
So what are you waiting for! Press the download key now, and make this buddy game your best game play during boring times, kick and beat the buddy to its death to overcome any threat surrounding your buddy world!

Beat the buddy bear game offers around twelve most famous cartoon characters which you could choose and beat the buddy with all your strong might! The hit the buddy game offers you the characters like zombie, panda bear, boss, doctor, sinister criminal, a wicked scientist, the evil bear, an evil girl etc. Choose and bear beat with any of your favorite characters protecting the world from devastation!

The on screen controls which you can use to beat hit and kick are simple touch controls. Use your deadly weapons provided by the bear buddy adventure game and drag them with finger to kill the buddy, flying to defend itself in every direction!
The buddy adventure game offers you a variety of lethal weapons to reduce the bear to mere ashes; it offers ak 47, buzzsaw, a lethal fan, fireworks, grenade, laser gun, a pistol, rocket hit and deadly ranch! Make sure you beat the bear within the time limit before it restores its bear devil powers again! Each blow to the buddy bear will earn you the coin bank which will help you unlock more lethal beat the buddy tools. Want another surprise? You can use your coin bank to unlock more bear characters and hit the bear tools.

How to play
Download this bear game
Select your favorite bear buddy
Select the kicking and hitting tools
Use the touch onscreen controls to drag the hitting tools to kill the bear
Kill the bear within the time limit
Keep a check on the buddy’s health bar to finish him quickly
Each hit to the buddy will earn you coin bank
Unlock more coins by watching video
Unlock the hitting tools with the coin bank

Features of the game
Beating and kicking interactive animation
Twelve different buddy bear characters
Eleven lethal tools to beat the bear
Flexible touch screen controls
Warning health bar of buddy bear death
HD interesting and user friendly graphics
